description: A Linux/MacOS CLI utility written in C (gcc) for performing binary comparison of two files or directories recursively and deleting matching files from the source.
A python script to dump the extensions installed in an instance of VS Code, should be cross-platform.
A cross-platform Python snippet that will combine .jpg images found in a folder to a single PDF.

A cross-platform Python snippet that will recursively scan folders for youtube-dl's .info.json files and combine them to a Pandas dataframe, suitable for exporting to .CSV, .xlsx, or any other format supported by Pandas.

A cross-platform Python snippet to recursively search for folder_name for files with the specified extension and a parenthesized number as the beginning of the file name, and remove the parenthesized number from the file name
A cross-platform Python snippet to recursively scans files in specified folder_name and adds date and time stamp code to filename if missing
